=API for stacktrace=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.stacktrace))
}}}


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#(_e_) e] [#(_print-cause-trace_tr) print-cause-trace] [#(_print-stack-trace_tr) print-stack-trace] [#(_print-throwable_tr) print-throwable] [#(_print-trace-element_e) print-trace-element] [#(_root-cause_tr) root-cause] 

----
===(_e_)===
<pre> REPL utility.  Prints a brief stack trace for the root cause of the
most recent exception.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/stacktrace.clj#68 Source]
----
===(_print-cause-trace_ tr)===
===(_print-cause-trace_ tr n)===
<pre> Like print-stack-trace but prints chained exceptions (causes).</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/stacktrace.clj#59 Source]
----
===(_print-stack-trace_ tr)===
===(_print-stack-trace_ tr n)===
<pre> Prints a Clojure-oriented stack trace of tr, a Throwable.
Prints a maximum of n stack frames (default: unlimited).
Does not print chained exceptions (causes).</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/stacktrace.clj#40 Source]
----
===(_print-throwable_ tr)===
<pre> Prints the class and message of a Throwable.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/stacktrace.clj#35 Source]
----
===(_print-trace-element_ e)===
<pre> Prints a Clojure-oriented view of one element in a stack trace.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/stacktrace.clj#24 Source]
----
===(_root-cause_ tr)===
<pre> Returns the last 'cause' Throwable in a chain of Throwables.</pre>
